articles.title: Petrol, diesel may get cheaper as OMCs become profitable: Report | Mint - Mint
articles.description: In contrast to peak losses of  ₹17 per litre on petrol and  ₹35 per litre on diesel in 2022, OMCs are now making a profit of  ₹8-10 per litre on petrol and  ₹3-4 per litre on diesel.

articles.author: Meghna Sen
articles.title: Inox India IPO: Price band fixed at Rs 627-660, issue opens on December 14 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Inox India has announced the price band for its upcoming IPO at ₹627-660 per equity share. The mainboard IPO will open for subscription on December 14 and close on December 18.
